attr.title: The Cosmic Wheel Sisterhood
attr.desc: Immerse yourself in an enchanting narrative experience as Fortuna, a fortune-teller Witch condemned to exile on her asteroid home. Craft your own Tarot deck, regain your freedom, and shape the fate of the cosmic Witch society.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo. This game requires at least 2GB RAM.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1340480/The_Cosmic_Wheel_Sisterhood/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo. This game requires at least `2GB` RAM.
